content: this crochet cup cozy pattern features a clean wavy line texture that adds a modern minimalist touch designed to fit a grande size cup this reusable crochet coffee sleeve is a quick and fun project for beginners and advanced makers alike the simple textured crochet pattern uses front post stitches to create subtle waves making it an eco-friendly and stylish crochet cup sleeve for everyday use skill level easy / intermediate size 20 oz venti /591 ml cup finished width 3 25 in 8 5 cm finished length 10 5 in 26 5 cm technical details - yarn worsted #4 100% cotton 25 g 39 m / 43 yds - hook us g-6 4 0 mm - instructions written + chart / photo tutorials - language en / us-terms when you purchase or download my patterns directly from my official shops ravelry or my website you get free updates if the pattern is revised or improved direct support from the designer in case you have questions high-quality files with clear photos and instructions and most importantly you re supporting an independent designer thank you
